Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with the highest quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it exceeds all expectations. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value lies well beyond $12000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece for $15000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
